text: Aur darya bhi ussi ney tumharay bus mein ker diye hain kay tum iss mein say (nikla hua) taza gosht khao aur iss mein say apney pehanney kay zaiwraat nikal sako aur tum dekhtay ho kay kashtiyan iss mein pani cheerti hui (chalti) hain aur iss liye bhi kay tum uss ka fazal talash kero aur hosakta hai kay tum shukar guzari bhi kero
